title: Are you bringing a claim on your own or with others?
h1: Are you making a claim on your own or with others?
p1: You can make a claim to an employment tribunal on your own, where you are the only claimant. You can also make a claim alongside another person, or a group of people who have been treated in the same way.
p2: It helps the employment tribunal to know which type it is. If you do not know, choose the first option.
p3: If you’re claiming with other people, you will be asked to tell us their names (if you know them).
radio2: I’m claiming with another person or other people

caseType.required: Tell us if you are claiming on your own or claiming with others
